content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome New Colleagues from WhiteHat to our big team!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are excited to have you on board! We believe you will become a part of EPAM’s success and share the pride of working for one of the world’s most progressive IT companies, as well as find a lot of opportunities for personal and professional growth.\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Onboarding Portal is aimed to provide you with additional information about EPAM and details about internal systems. Please take a few moments to acquaint yourself with these helpful resources.\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We know that you are very interested in how this impacts you and your colleagues in your immediate day-to-day operations. Most of your activities will remain unchanged, but there will be some additional activities that you will be asked to participate in as we integrate the WhiteHat team into EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Applications & Tools Trainings\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – There will be additional communications about the training program to onboard you to various EPAM Applications and Tools. In order to prepare for these trainings, we will be importing WhiteHat data loads into EPAM’s systems, all respecting GDPR restrictions!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":27845,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4129e295-c30e-4cb9-a95c-d1d0ff461c8a/1.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4129e295-c30e-4cb9-a95c-d1d0ff461c8a/1.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"1.jpg\",\"name\":\"1.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4129e295-c30e-4cb9-a95c-d1d0ff461c8a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":216,\"height\":216},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We’re very happy to have you on board!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAMAIntegration@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA M&A Integration Team\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in case of any questions you have within the transition period to EPAM.\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thank you and welcome to the team!\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
